# canRequestImageCapture

**Instance Property**

Will be `true` only when a call to [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ObjectCaptureSession/requestImageCapture()] is expected to be successful. It will be `false` when not in the `.capturing` state or if the session is too busy to currently process a new request. There is a period of time after requesting an image capture where this property will be `false` and a new call to [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ObjectCaptureSession/requestImageCapture()]  will not produce a new image.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var canRequestImageCapture: Bool { get }
```
